articles.title: Physical modeling for pure data (PMPD) and real-time interaction with an audio synthesis

title: pmpd2d~
description: The `pmpd2d~` object performs 2D particle-based physical modeling for audio synthesis. It allows users to create and connect masses with various properties like weight, position, and damping, forming a physical model. The object can receive real-time forces and position controls, and output mass positions and velocities, enabling the creation of complex, physically-simulated sounds.
